question:

B. 2 out of 15
C. 5 out of 10
D. 5 out of 15

Westview School is buying new basketball uniforms. Each uniform costs $46. The school will buy 12 uniforms. Which equation shows a way to find the total cost of the uniforms?

B. (40 × 6) + (10 × 2) = 240 + 20
C. (40 × 12) + (6 × 12) = 480 + 72
